thread.section_title: 4seating.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 4seating.com | 4seating.com | 2 of 24
thread.title: Mark LePino

author: Mark LePino
title: Mark LePino
text:
I spoke to Alex on a Sunday and spent about 10 minutes talking about different types of seating. I told him I would research the website a little more and get back to him. I called him back about 5 minutes later ready to make a purchase on some recliners we were talking about. he informed me of another brand that may interest me. I thought he was just trying to upsell me more expensive chairs. well I turns out these we actually a little cheaper and better quality of leather and had more features than the ones I was going to purchase. I made the purchase over the phone and Alex said the they would ship out Monday morning and he said they should arrive by superbowl but no promise. I said it did not matter. he said the delivery company would contact me and set up a delivery date and time. Tuesday afternoon about 1 pm I received a call from a delivery guy who said he had a delivery for me and I meet him at my house a out 10 mins later
to my surprise my recliners already arrived. I was shocked and actually called Alex to inform him that they arrived already. he was also surprised but happy they got there for me. I love the chairs they are the Seacrest Sonoma model in black. very comfortable. thank you for the advise and a wonderful experience
